Lancaster.West Lawn (Lancaster, Pennsylvania): West Lawn, also known as the Embassy House Apartments, is a historic home located at Lancaster, Lancaster County, Pennsylvania. It was built in 1873-1874, and is a T-shaped dwelling with a ​2 1⁄2-story main section and ​2 1⁄2-story rear wing with a slate covered mansard roof in a combined Italianate / Second Empire style. It features a ​3 1⁄2-story tower with a mansard roof.
